casebody.data:
HOME-OWNERS INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
Dominic F. ANDRIACCHI, Defendant/Counterplaintiff-Appellant. SC: 156151-4
COA: 331260
332457
332640
333695 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 28, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 8, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.

Bernstein, J., would grant leave to appeal.
